title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with egg mixture and pancetta.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste, then grill.
Fry onions until golden, add spices and tomato puree.
Simmer until thick, then add cream.
Mix in grilled chicken pieces and cook until done.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
